bibdata.title: Test conditions for milling machines with table of variable height, with horizontal or vertical spindle
Test conditions for milling machines with table of variable height, with horizontal or vertical spindle
Conditions d’essais des machines à fraiser à table de hauteur variable, à broche horizontale ou verticale
Conditions d’essais des machines à fraiser à table de hauteur variable, à broche horizontale ou verticale

clause.title: Scope
clause.p: This document specifies minimum requirements and test methods for rice (Oryza sativa L.).
It is applicable to husked rice, husked parboiled rice, milled rice and milled parboiled rice, suitable for human consumption, directly or after reconditioning.
It is not applicable to cooked rice products.
This document is updated in . See e.g. clause=2.
This document is unrelated to anchor=”what”.
